Name: Thriller
Description: Thrillers are characterized and defined by the moods they elicit, giving viewers heightened feelings of suspense, excitement, surprise, anticipation, and anxiety.

Name: Science-Fiction
Description: Science-Fiction is a genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science, such as extraterrestrial lifeforms, alien worlds, extrasensory perception, and time travel, along with futuristic elements such as spacecraft, robots, cyborgs, intersteller travel or other technologies.

Name: Horror
Description: Horror is a genre of speculative fiction which is intended to frighten, scare, disgust, or start its viewers by inducing feelings of horror and terror.
